descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/36tjVJp.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/OZgp5WE.jpg[/img][/center]



Added version compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36286/?] Feminine Females [/url] mod. Big thanks to NemesisTheWarlock, mod author :)

You should place my esp after Feminine Females esp, in the load order, to work properly.



Updated to 1.3 version. Fixed texture path.

Sorry for the confusion, but I came across a "Gray face" C K bug, and wrong textures paths. I had to include a head mesh file and take advantage of NifSkope to correct these errors.


I decide to improve Lydia`s, little horribly, vanilla face.

Strictly speaking, it's not a mod, but kind of compilation.
I took the best nexus face`s mods, mix it together, add less makeup facetint mask and now Lydia looks better.
No compression artifacts, less makeup tint, no blocky edge around lips, hires textures.

Should be compatible with UNP female body.

-- To uninstall, delete files and folder:

SkyrimDataLydiaPrettyFace.esp
SkyrimDataMeshesActorsCharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomSkyrim.esm�00A2C8E.NIF
SkyrimDataTexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintskyrim.esm�00a2c8e.dds
SkyrimDataTexturesLydia



All credits goes to:

zzjay
BellaGail for:
Diffuse face map, no compression 2048x2048: "Better Females By Bella Natural Edition" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113

dimon99
Vectorcide for:
Specular face map, 2048x2048: "DIMONIZED UNP female body" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

EvilDeadAsh34 for:
Normal map, no compression 1024x1024: "HD Normals v1 - Female Faces" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1039

tktk1 for:
Brow maps: "Pretty Face" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887


Sorry for my english, it's not my native language.

Mods used in my screenshots:
"TV ENB by Trillville" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11930
"Better Circlets HQ V1o1 by Yuril" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6495
"Fine Hair HQ by Yuril" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7627
"Realistic Eye Lighting by Risuun" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8832
"High Quality Eyes by Xenius" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498
